description:
A mobster and his goons are gunning for a witch, and Black☆Star and Tsubaki want the souls of all involved. Their plan runs into trouble when the witch’s bodyguard draws his sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est moi la star ! Le plus géant des hommes entre en scène ?
I Am the Star!: The Big Man Is Showing Up Here?
Ore Koso Star Da! Mottomo Big na Otoko, Koko ni Arawaru?
Sono io la star! Entra in scena il più grande di tutti?
俺こそスターだ! ~最もビッグな男, ここに現る?~
